alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:44AM CST until February 27 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Worth County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Clinton County in northwestern Missouri... Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Eastern Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... Eastern Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 230 AM CST. * At 144 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ravenwood to 6 miles northwest of King City to Agency, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Albany, Stanberry, Maysville, King City, Grant City, Stewartsville, Agency, Ravenwood, Union Star, Clarksdale, Irena, Easton, Conception Junction, Sheridan, Parnell, Cosby, Darlington, Mcfall and Guilford. This includes Interstate 29 near mile marker 34. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Nodaway; Worth
